Name: Ship-to-party Filtre GMS
Expression: {FILTER(TM1FILTERBYLEVEL(DESCENDANTS(STRTOMEMBER("[SLS_CUSTOMER].[" + [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Customer Retail GMS/RHF]) + "]")) , 0) , [SLS_CUSTOMER].[Sales Group Name] = [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Sales Group])),FILTER(TM1FILTERBYLEVEL(DESCENDANTS(STRTOMEMBER("[SLS_CUSTOMER].[" + [zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Customer Retail GMS/RHF]) + "]")) , 0) , [SLS_CUSTOMER].[Sales Group Name] = "Multiple Sales Group")}
